Text: Rockies Trade Cc Wed like to go ahead and book the Rockies trade from To reconfirm ENE Sells Contract per day to Tudor for NWPL Rockies Basis Term Apr Oct Price cents per MMBTU Thanks Vikas

Commodity Trading AccountI am interested in opening a personal commodity trading account Im not involved in a trading function here at Enron My manager Jennifer Fraser suggested I write you to find out what steps I need to take to ensure compliance before I open the account Your guidance on the subject is appreciated Thanks Vikas

Commodity Trading AccountI am interested in opening a personal commodity trading account Im not involved in a trading function here at Enron My manager Jennifer Fraser suggested I write you to find out what steps I need to take to ensure compliance before I open the account Your guidance on the subject is appreciated Thanks Vikas

URGENT Very ConfidentialForwarded by Vikas DwivediNAEnron on PM From Roberto Conterno EES PM To Jaime ES Eduardo ES Sebastian CorbachoET nron Enrique ES Felipe JensEnron nron Communications Santiago nron Andres NRON Stephen ES Bruno ES David FrostEnron nron Communications Sanjay nron Vikas nron Loftus ES John ES cc Eric ES Jaime GualyEnron nron Communications Alhamd NRON Subject URGENT Very Confidential Hi guys Please treat this as strictly confidential Please take action ASAP As you all know the Enron Associate offers havent been very popular among MBAs Given the fact that December is decisions month and that given the company growth we cannot afford lose a new breed of highly qualified people the following has been decided Present a proposal to Jeff Skilling today in order to improve the current offers The proposal will be presented this afternoon after two AssociatesSkillingHR interactions in which Skilling expressed more than once his concern about Enron offers being so low compared to the market IBanks Consulting firms Select one alumni per BSchool represented in the Associate Class you Authorize those representatives to send a standard email text provided below to the candidates who got offers in their respective BSchools in order to gain some time until the official HR communication hopefully caring good news is submitted The standard email should read EXACTLY as follows we are not authorized to change or add anything xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx To MBA students considering joining the Enron Associate Program I wanted to send you a quick note to let you know that a proposal to change the Associate compensation package has recently been presented to Jeff Skilling A decision concerning the recommended change is expected in the next few days More information will be provided as soon as possible Have a nice weekend Regards Representative Signature xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx We are asking you to the send the email under your name because we want this notification to be informal We have the authorization to do it this way In case you are contacted by any candidate the offical position should be consistent with the one in the email a decision is expected very soon we will let you know asap Please bcc me when you send the message since it is important to keep track about which BSchool candidates have been notified Thanks a lot for your help and quick response Roberto Conterno

RE Market MakingCharlespst Very cool Done Original Message From Weldon V Charles Sent Tuesday May AM To Dwivedi Vikas Subject Re Market Making Ill sell you up to Jun nat gas at right now same as Johnny

weldon PST MBA Class of Id like to let everyone know that I am leaving Enron to join Prudential Securities here in Houston It has been a good year and a fun year here at Enron My last day will be in approximately weeks Ill be seeing most of you around town My office is here in Downtown in the Houston Center about blocks away My contact information is Cell Work Email Vikas

RE Market MakingCharlespst Charlie thanks for making the market Its obvious Ive got no business trading right now In my current group I go for days without looking at the market Not a good recipe for profits Ill bring the PL tomorrow Vikas Original Message From Weldon V Charles Sent Tuesday May PM To Dwivedi Vikas Subject RE Market Making June settled at No pressure to pay but wanted to document Later Original Message From Vikas Dwivedi Sent Tuesday May PM To V Charles Weldon Subject RE Market Making Very cool Done Original Message From Weldon V Charles Sent Tuesday May AM To Dwivedi Vikas Subject Re Market Making Ill sell you up to Jun nat gas at right now same as Johnny
